name: Bumo
description:
Control a sphere to knock enemy spheres off the platform, increase your mass to take less knockback, buy stage skips to start out at a higher stage.

I made this game only to consolidate what I've learnt since I started learning unity just a little over a month ago, not to make it into a full-fledged game, so it has some flaws, but I am still proud of it, and just wanted to throw it on here for fun.

If you decide to download the game, I want to say thank you, I will get more and more motivated to learn unity as more people enjoy my game.
